linearState.title: Add dark mode to dashboard
linearState.description:
Sarah committed to adding dark mode to the dashboard this week.

**Progress update (2025-01-16):**
- 50% done
- Color palette completed
- Toggle component in progress

skipData.title: Add dark mode to dashboard

operations.reasoning: Dark mode work is complete and merged. Sarah mentioned it's done, so we SKIP rather than update. The new onboarding flow work mentioned is a new task but was not explicitly committed to with a deliverable in this standup.
